integration_patterns: Batch Processing with AWS S3 and Lambda

evidence.claim: Apricot uses AWS Lambda for serverless backend processing.
The platform complies with HIPAA and facilitates secure health data transactions.
They support X12 EDI transactions including 270 and 271 for eligibility checking.
FHIR APIs are available to interact with health data seamlessly.
Integration with major EHR systems is highlighted in their documentation.

icp.icp_reason: Targets healthcare data with X12 transactions and values API automation for interoperability.
